name: Tappy Balls
description:
Tappy Balls is easy to play but hard to master!

Tap to jump, keeping shooting hoops before time runs out.

Dunk, swish, and shoot baskets to catch on fire and beat your high score!

Featuring different balls and skins to customize your game. Challenge yourself or your friends and try to be the MVP!

Features:

- Free to play
- Simple one touch controls
- No internet connection needed
- Awesome balls waiting for you to unlock!

If you got any questions about our games, please contact support@supertapx.com for help.

Privacy Policy: http://policy.supertapx.com/
